row.name: Device model detection disabled
row.notes: Device model detection and device model report must be disabled.

row.name: Only major versions
row.notes: Only major OS and browser versions are stored.

row.name: Turn off visits log and visitor profiles
row.notes: Visits log is required to be disabled.

row.name: Campaign tracking parameters disabled
row.notes: All campaign tracking parameters must be discarded.

row.name: IP Anonymization Enabled
row.notes: Anonymization of Visitor's IP addresses must be enabled.

row.name: IP Address Mask Length
row.notes: Must be set to at least 2 byte(s), currently 2 byte(s).

row.name: Referrer anonymisation
row.notes: Only the referrer host or referrer type may be collected.

row.name: Data retention period
row.notes: Retention period is set to 180 days.

row.name: Limit available segments
row.notes: Limit the available segments to be compliant.

row.name: Screen resolution detection disabled
row.notes: Screen resolution detection and screen resolution report must be disabled.

row.name: User ID disabled
row.notes: Collection of User ID while tracking must be disabled.

row.name: Opt out
row.notes: Opt out must be manually set up and configured. Learn more
